named-query.name: getProjectInfosBySelectedIds
named-query.query: select pi from ProjectInfo pi where pi.id in :selectedIds

named-query.name: getSortitionNum
named-query.query: select pi.sortitionNum from ProjectInfo pi where pi.sortitionNum is not null

named-query.name: getprojectInfosByUnit
named-query.query: select pi from ProjectInfo pi where pi.unit = :unit and pi.sortitionNum is null
